entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Nipigon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cameron Falls 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 33 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -16.6°C
Wind: S 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow or drizzle in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm except locally 15 cm over higher terrain. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the afternoon then becoming light later in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or drizzle ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
